name: The Last Check, LLC
body:
The Last Check is dedicated to finding and communicating strategies and technologies that facilitate the cost-effective clearing of a declining financial instrument, the paper check.

The Last Check identifies tools, technologies, initiatives, working groups, directions, and issues confronting the banking industry, and their related vendor community, in addressing this very unique payment type.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
